title: Strengthening Practical Business Strategy Competencies: Specialized Language for Professionals Using Corpus Linguistics and Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in Basic Digital Tools and Comprehension of Discipline-Specific Terminology
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Analyze real-world language usage patterns in specialized domains using corpus analysis tools and generative AI technology

Learners will apply data-driven learning (DDL) methodologies to write three types of business documents (reports, proposals, analysis materials), meet at least four of five data accuracy verification checklist items, and achieve 4 points or higher (out of 5) on expert evaluation rubrics.
Establish critical evaluation and utilization strategies for AI-generated content based on digital literacy competencies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
